metadata.title: CVE-2018-14585 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-624. AP4_BytesToUInt16BE in Core/Ap4Utils.h has a heap-based buffer over-read after a call from the AP4_Stz2Atom class.

notes.note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
